name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeanette KNIGHTON, I. Abdul Jon a/k/a Michael Jones, Appellants

judges: Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeanette KNIGHTON, I. Abdul Jon a/k/a Michael Jones, Appellants.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
Judgments of Sentence affirmed.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

attorneys: Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Mark S. Gurevitz, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
441 A.2d 1214
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania v. Jeanette KNIGHTON, I. Abdul Jon a/k/a Michael Jones, Appellants.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Submitted Jan. 18, 1982.
Decided March 10, 1982.
Michael Jones, in pro. per.
Jeanette Knighton, in pro. per.
Robert B. Lawler, Chief, Appeals Div., Asst. Dist. Atty., Mark S. Gurevitz, Asst. Dist. Atty., for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, C.J., and ROBERTS, NIX, LARSEN, FLAHERTY, McDERMOTT and HUTCHINSON, JJ.
